overview:
David Cantu is responsible for managing multiple components of Redapt, Inc. His deep knowledge of enterprise IT, resourceful entrepreneurial skills and passion for exploring new technologies has been a cornerstone of the company’s success. His most valued accomplishments are working with his brother and his influence on the family-like culture within the organization.

In addition to working at Redapt, David lives to encourage other entrepreneurs to turn their vision into reality. He currently meets regularly with several early stage startups and also acts as an advisor to Appature and Rezin Sports Marketing.

David attended Western Washington University and majored in materials engineering. He is a member of the Northwest Minority Business Council and the National Minority Business Council, as well as the Dell partner advisory council. In his free time, he enjoys skiing, mountain biking, wake surfing and photography. He also actively participates with his son’s soccer and lacrosse teams.
